notes.eos_rank_source_meaning: standings = W/L record standings; eos_final_rank = Playoff Outcome Rank
notes.ensemble_definition: Model A + Model B (XGB) only; Model C (RF) is diagnostic only and not used in ensemble_score.
notes.mrr_top2: 1/rank of first team in top 2 (champion+runner-up) in predicted order.
notes.mrr_top4: 1/rank of first team in top 4 (Conference Finals) in predicted order.
notes.ndcg_cutoff_labels: ndcg_at_4=Conference Finals (top 4); ndcg_at_12=Clinch Playoff (top 12); ndcg_at_16=One Play-In Tournament (top 16); ndcg_at_20=Qualify for Playoffs (top 20); ndcg_at_30=full order.
notes.per_conference_relevance: Within E/W: actual rank derived from EOS_global_rank (1=best in conf); NDCG/Spearman use this relevance.
notes.playoff_metrics: Spearman (pred global vs Playoff Outcome Rank), NDCG@4 (Conference Finals), Brier (champion vs odds). rank_mae/rank_rmse: pred vs Playoff Outcome Rank; W/L record standings vs Playoff Outcome Rank (baseline).
notes.model_vs_standings: Regular-season W/L standings vs same final outcome ranks as models. Each model has MAE and RMSE vs outcome; improvement_mae/improvement_rmse = standings_error - model_error (positive = model better). Significance: paired bootstrap over teams (resample teams, mean(standings_ae - model_ae)); p_value = proportion of bootstrap <= 0.
notes.confusion_matrices: Binary top-k: actual vs predicted in top k (1=yes, 0=no). Rows=actual, cols=pred. cutoffs 4, 8, 16 = Conference Finals, Semis, Playoff.
notes.confusion_matrices_ranking_top16: Ranking matrix: top 16 teams in order. Rows = actual rank 1..16, cols = predicted rank 1..16 (+ Pred 17+). Cell (i,j) = count of teams that finished actual rank i and were predicted rank j.

ensemble.method: paired bootstrap over teams (resample teams, mean(standings_ae - model_ae)); H0: no improvement

model_a.method: paired bootstrap over teams (resample teams, mean(standings_ae - model_ae)); H0: no improvement

xgb.method: paired bootstrap over teams (resample teams, mean(standings_ae - model_ae)); H0: no improvement
